maxCapacity_formula.description: Max number of guests allowed based on total floor area. Affects ticket/entry capacity and sales potential.

rentCostMultiplier.description: Scales monthly rent cost relative to baseline venue rent.

cleaningCostMultiplier.description: Scales cleaning/maintenance expenses per event or per day.

acousticModifier.description: Boosts or penalizes overall sound quality score; influenced by ceiling height and room shape.

guestComfort.description: Affects how long guests stay before leaving; modifies drink sales and crowd happiness.

bottleneckPenalty.description: Penalty applied to bar sales if floor plan is too complex; ranges 0.0 to -0.15.

maintenanceCostMultiplier.description: Extra upkeep for more rooms/partitions; affects daily overhead.

vipZoneAvailability.description: If true, enables VIP ticketing and upselling features.

bandTierCap.description: Highest tier of band/artist you can book; scales with stage size and backstage space.

bandFeeNegotiationModifier.description: Multiplier on artist booking fees. High backstage quality and stage size reduce cost.

showQualityScore.description: Base rating for concert quality; affects reviews and repeat business.

ticketDemandMultiplier.description: Direct multiplier to ticket demand based on lighting, acoustics, and aesthetics.

noiseFineRisk.description: Relative chance of noise complaints and fines. Lower sound isolation increases this risk.

curfewRisk.description: Chance of being forced to shut down early; lowered by compliance upgrades.

powerAvailability.description: Represents ability to handle electrical demand. < 1.0 restricts band equipment usage.

guestStayDuration.description: Average time a guest stays. Higher means more drinks sold.

attendanceModifier.description: Overall boost or penalty to attendance based on climate control and comfort.

drinkSalesPerGuest.description: Average spend per guest on drinks. More bars or better comfort increase this.

waitTimeModifier.description: Represents queue length impact. < 1.0 means shorter waits, happier guests.

guestSatisfaction.description: Aggregated rating from guests; affects reputation and repeat visitors.

olderDemographicAttendance.description: Scaling factor for attendance of older demographics; depends on seating availability.

standingShowAppeal.description: Boosts appeal for younger, energetic crowds if seating is low.

venueAttractiveness.description: Base attractiveness score; affects organic demand, influencer interest, and reviews.

maxCapacityCap.description: Hard cap multiplier based on fire exits; restricts usable maxCapacity.

shutdownRisk.description: Likelihood of forced closure events. Lower with more exits & compliance upgrades.

insuranceCostMultiplier.description: Scales cost of venue insurance policy.

complianceEventRisk.description: Chance of surprise inspections or penalties per month.

openHoursCap.description: Fraction of ideal operating hours allowed by curfew/zoning.

salesPotential.description: Overall sales capacity relative to a 24/7 ideal venue.

artistHappiness.description: Improves chances of booking bigger acts or discounts on fees.

bookingFeeModifier.description: Direct multiplier for band/artist fees based on backstage & hospitality.

backstageActTierCap.description: Similar to bandTierCap but influenced by backstage size and amenities.

foodAndMerchRevenue.description: Additional revenue multiplier if kitchen/storage space is available.

logisticsCostModifier.description: Lower means cheaper supply restocking and smoother operations.

attendanceFromDrivers.description: Extra attendance based on parking availability.

warmWeatherCapacity.description: Extra capacity unlocked by outdoor space during warm months.

daytimeEventAvailability.description: If true, allows matinee or day events on weekends.

walkInTrafficMultiplier.description: Multiplier for random passersby converting into paying guests.

venueReputation.description: Global 0â€“100 score that grows with good events and drops with bad reviews.

socialMediaBuzz.description: Multiplier that increases ticket sales after great events or influencer visits.

heatmapCrowdFlow.description: Track guest movement patterns to detect chokepoints and optimize layout.

eventHypeModifier.description: Temporary multiplier for ticket demand when marketing campaigns run.
